amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), insert the following: SEC. 211. None of the funds made available by this Act may be used to deliver to the office of a Member of the House of Representatives (including a Delegate or Resident Commissioner to the Congress) a printed copy of the Daily Calendar of the House of Representatives which is prepared by the Clerk of the House of Representatives.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 7 printed in House Report 113-426 to prohibit funding for the delivery of printed copies of the Daily Calendar of the United States House of Representatives to member offices, as this document is accessible online.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Wenstrup amendment (A007) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A007) offered by Mr. Wenstrup.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Wenstrup amendment (A007) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
